v-model:show.description: Whether to display the share panel

cancel-text.description: Unblock the button text, pass in an empty string to hide the button
cancel-text.description_zh: 取消按钮文字，传入空字符串可以隐藏按钮

description.description: Auxiliary descriptive text below the title
description.description_zh: 标题下方的辅助描述文字

duration.description: Animation duration, in seconds, is set to 0 to disable animation
duration.description_zh: 动画时长，单位秒，设置为 0 可以禁用动画

z-index.description: Set the panel's z-index level to a fixed value
z-index.description_zh: 将面板的 z-index 层级设置为一个固定值

overlay.description: Whether or not to display the mask layer

overlay-class.description: Customize the mask layer class name

lock-scroll.description: Whether to lock the background scroll

lazy-render.description: Whether the content is rendered when the bounce layer is displayed
lazy-render.description_zh: 是否在显示弹层时才渲染内容

close-on-popstate.description: Whether it is automatically closed when the page falls back
close-on-popstate.description_zh: 是否在页面回退时自动关闭

close-on-click-overlay.description: Whether to close when you click on the mask layer
close-on-click-overlay.description_zh: 是否在点击遮罩层后关闭

teleport.description: Specifies the node to be mounted, which is equivalent to the [to property](https://cn.vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#teleport) of the Teleport component
teleport.description_zh: 指定挂载的节点，等同于 Teleport 组件的 [to 属性](https://cn.vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#teleport)

:before-close.description: The callback function before closing, returning 'false' to prevent closing, supports returning Promise
:before-close.description_zh: 关闭前的回调函数，返回 `false` 可阻止关闭，支持返回 Promise

Option.name: icon
Option.description: 图标，可选值为 `wechat` `weibo` `qq` `link` `qrcode` `poster` `weapp-qrcode` `wechat-moments`，支持传入图片 URL

events.name: select
events.description: Triggered when you click on the Share option

events.name: cancel
events.description: Triggered when the cancel button is clicked

events.name: open
events.description: Triggers when a panel is opened

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the panel is closed

events.name: opened
events.description: Opens the panel and triggers when the animation ends
events.description_zh: 打开面板且动画结束后触发

events.name: closed
events.description: Close the panel and trigger when the animation ends
events.description_zh: 关闭面板且动画结束后触发

events.name: click-overlay
events.description: Triggered when the mask layer is clicked

slots.name: cancel
slots.description: Customize the content of the cancel button
